Body:
cube1 = Cube((3, 3, 3))
cube2 = Cube((3, 3, 3))
turn.perform(cube1, orientation)
origin = Orientation()
turn.from_orientation(orientation, origin).perform(cube2, origin)
for side in Side:
    o = Orientation.regular(side)
    assert str(cube1.get_side(o).colors) == str(cube2.get_side(o).colors)
pytest.mark.parametrize('orientation, turn', cartesian(list(
    _iterate_orientations()), [Turn(Side.LEFT, 1), Turn(Side.LEFT, 1, 3),
    Turn(Side.RIGHT, 1), Turn(Side.RIGHT, 1, 3), Turn(Side.TOP, 1), Turn(
    Side.TOP, 1, 3), Turn(Side.BOTTOM, 1), Turn(Side.BOTTOM, 1, 3), Turn(
    Side.FRONT, 1), Turn(Side.FRONT, 1, 3), Turn(Side.BACK, 1), Turn(Side.
    BACK, 1, 3)]))
